overview:
Mark Josephson is the CEO of Outside.in. Previously he served as President of Seevast.

Prior to Seevast, Josephson was Executive Vice President, Marketing and Business Development of About, Inc., where he was responsible for About, Inc.’s three operating divisions: About.com, Sprinks and About Web Services. Josephson also served as General Manager of About.com, overseeing the creation and management of the About.com service and its 450 GuideSites.

Other previous positions include Senior Vice President of Strategic Alliances for About.com and Account Manager for Cone Communications, a marketing and communications firm, in their Sporting Goods and Interactive practices. He was a founding member of Cone’s Interactive practice, working with leading new media brands including Miningco.com and iVillage.com.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President, Marketing and Business Development
